channel.title: How to spoof CPU on Whonix Gate+Workstation
channel.description:
Dear friends,
Knowing people want to cover their identity, is there any way to spoof title of CPU. On Virtual machine i can see that my real CPU is discovered. Anyone hacking my Workstation might detect my CPU. The fact that if have rare processor, he can worst exploits such as Meltdown to integrate directly to memory of processor because hacker knows what CPU i have.
Is it real to spoof if? If not will you be able to do something with it in fututre updates?

item.title: How to spoof CPU on Whonix Gate+Workstation
item.dc:creator: Goldstein
item.description:
Hi,
there are a few Form Posts about that already, see:

Whonix

Protocol-Leak-Protection and Fingerprinting-Protection

Protection from IP Leaks, DNS Leaks, Protocol Leaks and Fingerprinting. Analysis of host hardware identifiers visible or hidden inside virtual machine...


https://forums.whonix.org/t/hardware-information-leaking/
https://forums.whonix.org/t/guest-systems-sees-cpu-of-the-host/

Read full topic
item.source: How to spoof CPU on Whonix Gate+Workstation
